001package net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.steps;
002
003import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.Array;
004import net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.JavaNumberTypeSupport;
005import net.tvburger.jdl.common.utils.Pair;
006import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.TypedVector;
007import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vector;
008import net.tvburger.jdl.linalg.Vectors;
009import net.tvburger.jdl.model.HyperparameterConfigurable;
010import net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars.LinearCombination;
011import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.LearningRateConfigurable;
012import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.optimizer.UpdateStep;
013import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.ExplicitRegularization;
014import net.tvburger.jdl.model.training.regularization.Regularizations;
015
016import java.util.Map;
017import java.util.Set;
018import java.util.WeakHashMap;
019
020public class AdamW<N extends Number> implements UpdateStep<LinearCombination<N>, N>, LearningRateConfigurable<N>, HyperparameterConfigurable {
021
022    public static final String HP_BETA_1 = "beta1";
023    public static final String HP_BETA_2 = "beta2";
024    public static final String HP_LAMBDA = "lambda";
025
026    private final Map<LinearCombination<N>, Pair<TypedVector<N>, TypedVector<N>>> adaptions = new WeakHashMap<>();
027
028    private N learningRate;
029    private N beta1;
030    private N beta2;
031    private N lambda;
032
033    public AdamW(N learningRate, N beta1, N beta2, N lambda) {
034        this.learningRate = learningRate;
035        this.beta1 = beta1;
036        this.beta2 = beta2;
037        this.lambda = lambda;
038    }
039
040    @Override
041    public Vector<N> calculateUpdate(Vector<N> gradients, LinearCombination<N> model, int step, Set<ExplicitRegularization<N>> regularizations) {
042        JavaNumberTypeSupport<N> typeSupport = model.getNumberTypeSupport();
043
044        Pair<TypedVector<N>, TypedVector<N>> adaptions = this.adaptions.computeIfAbsent(model, k -> Pair.mutable(null, null));
045        TypedVector<N> m = adaptions.left();
046        TypedVector<N> v = adaptions.right();
047
048        Array<N> parameters = model.getParameters();
049        Vector<N> thetas = new TypedVector<>(parameters, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport());
050        TypedVector<N> regularizationGradients = (TypedVector<N>) Regularizations.applyExplicitRegularization(regularizations, thetas, gradients);
051
052        // m = β1 * m + (1 - β1) * g
053        TypedVector<N> secondTermM = regularizationGradients.multiply(typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta1));
054        m = m == null ? secondTermM : m.multiply(beta1).add(secondTermM);
055
056        // v = β2 * v + (1 - β2) * g^2
057        TypedVector<N> gradientSquared = Vectors.squared(regularizationGradients);
058        TypedVector<N> secondTermV = gradientSquared.multiply(typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta2));
059        v = v == null ? secondTermV : v.multiply(beta2).add(secondTermV);
060
061        // Store the results
062        adaptions.setLeft(m);
063        adaptions.setRight(v);
064
065        // Bias correction
066        N beta1T = typeSupport.pow(this.beta1, step);
067        N beta2T = typeSupport.pow(this.beta2, step);
068        N oneMinusBeta1T = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta1T);
069        N oneMinusBeta2T = typeSupport.subtract(typeSupport.one(), beta2T);
070
071        TypedVector<N> mHat = m.multiply(typeSupport.inverse(oneMinusBeta1T));
072        TypedVector<N> vHat = v.multiply(typeSupport.inverse(oneMinusBeta2T));
073
074        // θ = θ - α * m̂ / (sqrt(v̂) + ε)
075        TypedVector<N> vHatSqrt = Vectors.squareRoot(vHat); // element wise sqrt
076        TypedVector<N> denom = vHatSqrt.add(typeSupport.epsilon()); // epsilon is scalar, broadcasts
077
078        // Weight decay
079        TypedVector<N> weightDecayTerm = new TypedVector<>(parameters, true, model.getNumberTypeSupport()).multiply(lambda);
080        return Vectors.divide(mHat, denom).add(weightDecayTerm).multiply(model.getNumberTypeSupport().negate(learningRate));
081    }
082
083    @Override
084    public Map<String, Object> getHyperparameters() {
085        return Map.of(
086                HP_LEARNING_RATE, learningRate,
087                HP_BETA_1, beta1,
088                HP_BETA_2, beta2,
089                HP_LAMBDA, lambda);
090    }
091
092    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
093    @Override
094    public void setHyperparameter(String name, Object value) {
095        if (HP_LEARNING_RATE.equals(name)) {
096            this.learningRate = (N) value;
097        }
098        if (HP_BETA_1.equals(name)) {
099            this.beta1 = (N) value;
100        }
101        if (HP_BETA_2.equals(name)) {
102            this.beta2 = (N) value;
103        }
104        if (HP_LAMBDA.equals(name)) {
105            this.lambda = (N) value;
106        }
107    }
108
109    public N getBeta1() {
110        return beta1;
111    }
112
113    public void setBeta1(N beta1) {
114        this.beta1 = beta1;
115    }
116
117    public N getBeta2() {
118        return beta2;
119    }
120
121    public void setBeta2(N beta2) {
122        this.beta2 = beta2;
123    }
124
125    public N getLambda() {
126        return lambda;
127    }
128
129    public void setLambda(N lambda) {
130        this.lambda = lambda;
131    }
132}
